name: Beetle Chomp
description:
Drag Barry to fling him (like Angry Birds).
SPACE: Rewind Time. 

Game design, art: Asher (9 years old)
Music, sound fx, and level design: Isaac (7 years old)
Bugs and Dad Jokes: Dylan (older than them)

This is our second game and our second game jam. While we  had a week to work on it, we've been on a rare away-from-home trip to a renovated farmhouse in Virginia wine country with a private pool. Priorities people!

All the bugs in this game were found in or near the pool!
